    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>40cf022b-4e24-4263-2a60-666883256aff#1#3</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">A Szent Mihály testvérület céhháza, 1480 körül, Fritzlar, Németország.</string>
            <string language="en">The guild-hall of the Saint Michael brotherhood, ca. 1480, Fritzlar, Germany.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Zünft-Halle der Heiliger Michael 
Bruderschaft, Ca. 1480, Fritzlar, Deutschland.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le guilde-hall de la confrérie de Saint Michael, 
ca. 1480, Fritzlar, Allemagne.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O guild-salão do brotherhood de Saint Michael, 
ca. 1480, Fritzlar, Germany.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il cooperativa-corridoio della fratellanza del San
Michael, ca. 1480, Fritzlar, Germania.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η συντεχνία-αίθουσα της αδελφοσύνης Αγίου michael, 
περίπου 1480, Fritzlar, Γερμανία.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El gremio-pasillo de la fraternidad de Santo 
Michael, ca. 1480, Fritzlar, Alemania.</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A Fritzlari Szent Mihály testvérület céhházának díszes zárterkélye és árkádos földszinti csarnoka látható a képen.</string>
            <string language="en">A picture about the ornamental bay window and arcaded hall of the guild-hall of Saint Michael brotherhood in Fritzlar</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">céhház,  Friztlar,  gótikus építészet,  középkori város,  15.század,  </string>
            <string language="en">guild-hall, Fritzlar, Gothic architecture, medieval town, 15th century, </string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Abbildung über das dekorative Buchtfenster und 
arcaded Halle der Zünft-Halle Heiliger Michael der Bruderschaft in 
Fritzlar</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une image au sujet de la fenêtre en saillie ornementale 
et arcaded le hall du guilde-hall de la confrérie de Saint Michael 
dans Fritzlar</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um retrato sobre a janela de baía ornamental e arcaded o 
salão do guild-salão do brotherhood de Saint Michael em Fritzlar</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un'immagine circa la finestra di baia ornamentale ed 
arcaded il corridoio del cooperativa-corridoio della fratellanza del 
San Michael in Fritzlar</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια εικόνα για το διακοσμητικό παράθυρο κόλπων και τη 
με στοές αίθουσα της συντεχνία-αίθουσας της αδελφοσύνης Αγίου 
michael σε Fritzlar</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Un cuadro sobre la ventana de bahía ornamental y arcaded 
el pasillo del gremio-pasillo de la fraternidad de Santo Michael en 
Fritzlar</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zünft-Halle, Fritzlar, gotische Architektur, 
mittelalterliche Stadt, 15. Jahrhundert,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">guilde-hall, Fritzlar, architecture gothique, ville 
médiévale, 15ème siècle,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">guild-salão, Fritzlar, arquitetura gothic, cidade 
medieval, 1ö século,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">cooperativa-corridoio, Fritzlar, architettura gotica, 
città medioevale, quindicesimo secolo,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">συντεχνία-αίθουσα, Fritzlar, γοτθική αρχιτεκτονική, 
μεσαιωνική πόλη, 15$ος αιώνας,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">gremio-pasillo, Fritzlar, configuración gótica, 
ciudad medieval, décimo quinto siglo,</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>

            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
